    '83c393c0db5250947aab7104399619c0': '500801'
}

for (var ci in registros) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
    if (gr.get(ci)) {
        gr.u_account = findAccountByNumber(registros[ci]);
        gr.update();
    }
}

function findAccountByNumber(number) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('customer_account');
    gr.addEncodedQuery('u_account_number=' + number);
    gr.query();

    if (gr.next()) {
        return gr.getUniqueValue();
    }
}

var gr1 = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
gr1.addEncodedQuery("sys_idIN080d283e130d3f8426d55d122244b0db,5e82ec7c4fc1ab00f3d33d828110c7cc,2b9c64ba130d3f8426d55d122244b017^ORDERBYname");
gr1.query();

while (gr1.next()) {
    gr1.location = '111707c44f982b0069913d828110c7f6';
    gr1.update();
}
